author: Ulrich Schonhardt
comment: Let's be honest: it's absurd and futile to strap a tiny computer on the wrist and call it a "smart" watch. It's neither smart nor a watch. It needs charging every day and is dead after 3 years max.

author: Armand Xhaja
comment: Greatest idea ever! It reminds me of a Black Sabbath song though. Into the void! 😂

author: Richard Carr
comment: Rubbish

author: Steve Lester
comment: I have changed my rating from 5 stars to 5 after the developer pointed out my stupidity with regard to advert blocking. It was my mistake. I feel utterly stupid. STUPID. STUPID STUPID STUPID. I hate myself. But on the plus side, I can now successfully purchase tampons for my stress related nosebleeds. Wonderful is the only word for this app and the developer. Apart from telloniflous

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
I think you need to add an exception in your Adblock-like filter to see them.
If you want to get rid of counting every second, I propose a sundial (preferably made in stone) that you always wear at your other wrist.

title: The smell of new carpet is better

author: Siberian Stallion
comment: Since I sleep with my watch on, and I like to use it as my alarm clock as well, this is perfect, since I toss and turn a bunch, so the bright screen on my moto360 turns itself on and off, bugging me and making it hard to fall asleep.  The only way to fix that in the system, is to turn on Theater mode, but that turns off notifications as well.  So this watchface serves as a fantastic alternative, that doesn't disable my alarm.  Thumbs up and five stars to this unique as can get idea, love it

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: You might not be aware of, but there is an option called "Tilt to wake screen" in the official Android Wear app which you might want to disable. Of course, if during your sleep, unconsciously, you start touching your watch, calling KITT, activating the cruise mode,and believing you are Michael Knight in Knight Rider, this will not work.

title: It may be a gimmick, but it still has its uses

author: Thomas Galland
comment: I love this watch face not only because it never has to be updated but the review section has always been a place to go to give me a good laugh. Who needs apps like iFunny or 9Gag when they can just read the reviews of this app. Keep up the wonderful work!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you for your kind reply, I also do not understand why they did not include such a simply beautiful and _elegant_ masterpiece. Maybe it's a secret and thus, must remains hidden.

author: saad pistilli
comment: Elegant yet sporty!! Installing this watch face is by far the best thing that I have ever done in my entire life!! When gazing upon it's beautiful digital canvas, I can think of nothing better to describe it's beauty but caviar and all night Atlantic City hookers (that elegant/sporty feeling).

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Glad you discovered its true nature. An elegant sport watchface, on the list of 5 items every golfer should own.

title: Fantastic!!

author: CA B
comment: Works super well. Beautiful design, but it failed to save my broken marriage, so minus one star. If you're reading this, Janice, please come home! The kids and I miss you! Please!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: * This escalated quickly *

title: Ehh

author: Ancient Infant
comment: It was as if I could taste the wind gracefully purr into my tumultuous ebony locks as my eyes were quickly escorted beyond the discordian Void. A villainous stroke of savage ecstasy throttled me high, into the incessant lighting of a Neroesque discotheque. Among the aromas of flesh and guilt, the sole scent peeling back my nostrils with a violent lust lay before my meekly bare feet, disengorging itself to death. As it absconded into absurdity, the wind's wisdom left my tounge, and I went back to my life. ~B

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
Nice anti-poetry attempt, but FYI there is no air in the void!
Are you this kind who believes that sound effects are real in sci-fi movies, especially in the space where there is no air to propagate sound?

title: Fermenting in the flagulant twilight

author: Dennis Hall
comment: I downloaded this app with little to no real expectation-  WOW!! I now have the confidence to throw my wife's boyfriend out of our bedroom.  He's been here for the last 6 months eating my food,  watching my tv and feeding my dog! I have to admit, he still  sleeping with my wife, but I get to watch Empire!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: To be honest, I would have never imagined that it could restore so much confidence, thank you for this very.. particular.. testimonial. WOW!! indeed..

title: A must have app!!!

author: Ettercap
comment: Someone sold me their Sony Smartwatch 3 for $30.00 because they thought it was broken when in fact it just had this watch face applied. They thought the screen or backlight was broken you are my hero. **I wasn't the one who applied the watch face I bought it on ebay being told it was broken by the seller and I thought i could fix it, this was just a pleasant surprise.**

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: I have reported you!

title: This watch face saved me $120

comment: You bet, won the lottery too 😁

title: Thank God this watchface is available for download

author: Patrick Tobin
comment: Let's be honest here. I had to download this so that I could give it a review and I just want to say: well done. Just reading these reviews made my night. How can anyone give this less than 5 stars when its the most flawlessly working app I have ever used.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Could not agree more about the ratings, this is so unfair. Why isn't any law to punish the perpetrators? And where are the people when it's all about defending their own right?? How come...

title: Perfection

author: Angel Reyes
comment: Simply amazing, simple, clean and dark, it's a dream come true, but in day light there are unwanted reflects of sky, trees and other useless things that mess the beautiful of your work and the hd of the face please fix!!!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
Well... 
Please send us your crash report(s), so we can get investigate and see what is causing the problem, thank you.
The crash log and crash dump help us to decipher what the issue was at the time of the crash and lets our developers find a solution so that it does not happen again.

comment: When I bought this I won the powerball because I checked my watch and new in my heart this was the write time to scratch my ticket so I did and then all of the numbers did come back right so then I earned money!!!

title: Amazing!!!1!!

title: Finally a perfect solution for the irritating "flat tire"

author: Sharath Ravishankar
comment: Who even uses watches to see the time these days? This watch face brings back the grandeur of a hollow fashion statement on your wrist.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Personally, I always carry a sundial in granite with me so I don't really need a watch, especially if it is for bringing me the time at a such additional weight cost on my wrist.

title: Incredible.

title: Mystically awesome!

title: Does what I need perfectly

author: Chris Tiburzi
comment: This is one of my favorite watch faces. I love black and simple watch faces. This one has the best of both worlds. As an added bonus my watch battery lasted almost 6 days! Thank you for this wonderful app that is useful in so many ways.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Hmmm.. weird, you battery might be defective if it only lasted almost 6 days. I do not think you are eligible for a battery replacement, certainly not free of charge.

title: One of the best watch faces!

author: Александр Слободчиков
comment: Why do you need the Turing test? I'm not a bot:) Малевич is a well-known Soviet artist who is most famous with his 'Black Square' painting http://goo.gl/vFVlGP . Also he created many others provocative and absurd works like a 'White on White'. BTW you could create a white version of your watch face. It can be used as a flashlight at least:) P.S. I use your WF, now you could try mine http://goo.gl/QjIJyO  Do not judge it very serious too pls:)
